entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Muncho Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 p.m. PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Rain over western sections early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over eastern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm except 10 cm over eastern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm over eastern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023
